section.para: In this situation, everything is still running (&lcm;, control plane nodes, and compute nodes) but you want to restore your Swift rings to a previous state.

section.title: Restore from an SSH backup
section.para: Follow the same procedure as for Swift in the section immediately preceding this one, but select the job &lcm; Default: Swift restore from SSH.
